references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models which are a core technique used in many 3D generation methods.
This paper introduces DreamFusion, a pioneering text-to-3D generation method that leverages 2D diffusion models and is a major influence on Hallo3D's design.
This paper introduces classifier-free diffusion guidance, which is a technique used in Hallo3D to improve the quality and controllability of 3D generation.

references.paper_title: Learning Transferable Visual Models From Natural Language Supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is used in Hallo3D for its multi-modal capabilities, enabling the system to understand and leverage both image and text information.
DDIM, introduced in this paper, is employed by Hallo3D for its efficient sampling process, allowing for high-quality and consistent image generation.
